text: The American Collegiate Athletic Association Men's Basketball Tournament is the annual conference basketball championship tournament for the NCAA Division III American Collegiate Athletic Association. The tournament has been held annually since 2018. It is a single-elimination tournament and seeding is based on regular season records. The winner, while declared conference champion, will not receive an automatic bid to the NCAA Men's Division III Basketball Championship until 2020, the third year of the ACAA's existence. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Champions !Score !Runner- Up !Venue |- align=center | 2018 |Pine Manor |62–53 |Maine–Presque Isle |Chestnut Hill, MA |- align=center | 2019 |SUNY Delhi |77–75 |Alfred State |Alfred, NY |- align=center | 2020 |SUNY Delhi |94–42 |Pine Manor |Delhi, NY |} ==Championship records== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center;" |- ! School ! Finals Record !
